longBusinessSummary: Aegon N.V. provides insurance, pensions, retirement, and asset management services in the Americas, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company offers life, accident, property and casualty, and health insurance; annuities, retirement plans, and mutual funds; mortgage loans; and individual retirement accounts, as well as stable value, investment management, and digital banking solutions. It offers its products under the Aegon and Transamerica brands. The company was founded in 1844 and is headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands.
